world

Class SimpleWorldObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.SimpleWorldObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NullSimpleWorldObject

    public abstract class SimpleWorldObject
extends java.lang.Object
    The "global" object for the SimpleWorld that can render ontop of the screen. This class has one method that the user overrides to paint over the screen.
    Version:
    1.2 Now all code is abstracted as MVC.
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama

      SimpleWorldObject() 

    • Method Summary

      abstract void update()
      Game logic held in SimpleWorldObject should be updated here.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleWorldObject

        public SimpleWorldObject()

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Game logic held in SimpleWorldObject should be updated here. This is also a good place to update any game view there might be using a controller.
